languages.text: "По крайней мере вы не отрицаете очевидное. Это уже хорошее начало. Просто запомните, что, если вдруг пожелаете покаяться, я приму чистосердечное признание с тем же снисхождением, с которым принял эти ваши слова".
"At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."
languages.original_text: "По крайней мере вы не отрицаете очевидное. Это уже хорошее начало. Просто запомните, что, если вдруг пожелаете покаяться, я приму чистосердечное признание с тем же снисхождением, с которым принял эти ваши слова".

traits.locale_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I have accepted your words just now."
"At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I have accepted your words just now."
"At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."
"At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."
"At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

languages.text: 「少なくとも明白な点は否定しないのだな。いいだろう。覚えておけ、万が一でも悔い改める気持ちがあるのなら、たった今お前の言葉を受け入れたのと同じように、お前の告白も受け入れよう」
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: 「少なくとも明白な点は否定しないのだな。いいだろう。覚えておけ、万が一でも悔い改める気持ちがあるのなら、たった今お前の言葉を受け入れたのと同じように、お前の告白も受け入れよう」

languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

languages.text: “至少你没有自欺欺人，你开了个好头。我已经宽容地接受了你的言辞，如果你打算忏悔的话，请记住，我也愿意以同样的宽容，随时接受你的忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: “至少你没有自欺欺人，你开了个好头。我已经宽容地接受了你的言辞，如果你打算忏悔的话，请记住，我也愿意以同样的宽容，随时接受你的忏悔。”

languages.text: «Por lo menos no niega las evidencias. Es buen comienzo. Si en algún momento decide arrepentirse, aceptaré su confesión con la misma permisividad con la que he aceptado sus palabras ahora».
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo menos no niega las evidencias. Es buen comienzo. Si en algún momento decide arrepentirse, aceptaré su confesión con la misma permisividad con la que he aceptado sus palabras ahora».

languages.text: « J'apprécie que vous ne cherchiez pas à nier l'évidence. C'est un bon début. Sachez que s'il vous prenait l'envie de vous repentir, je ferais preuve d'autant d'indulgence à l'écoute de votre confession qu'envers vos paroles à l'instant. »
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: « J'apprécie que vous ne cherchiez pas à nier l'évidence. C'est un bon début. Sachez que s'il vous prenait l'envie de vous repentir, je ferais preuve d'autant d'indulgence à l'écoute de votre confession qu'envers vos paroles à l'instant. »

languages.text: "Immerhin leugnet Ihr nicht das Offensichtliche. Das ist ein guter Anfang. Vergesst nicht, solltet Ihr Buße tun wollen, werde ich Eure Beichte ebenso nachsichtig anhören wie Eure Worte gerade eben."
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: "Immerhin leugnet Ihr nicht das Offensichtliche. Das ist ein guter Anfang. Vergesst nicht, solltet Ihr Buße tun wollen, werde ich Eure Beichte ebenso nachsichtig anhören wie Eure Worte gerade eben."

languages.text: "En azından bariz olanı inkâr etmiyorsun. Fena bir başlangıç sayılmaz. Şunu unutma: Eğer tövbe etmek istersen suçlarını itiraf edişini de böyle yumuşak başlılıkla dinleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "At least you're not denying the obvious. That's a good start. Just remember, should you wish to repent, I will accept your confession with as much lenience as I accepted your words just now."

traits.locale_text: "En azından bariz olanı inkâr etmiyorsun. Fena bir başlangıç sayılmaz. Şunu unutma: Eğer tövbe etmek istersen, suçlarını itiraf edişini de böyle yumuşak başlı bir şekilde dinleyeceğimdir."
